item.title: Loads of dog poo, 23rd August
item.description:
Loads of dog poo on both parts of the grass I’ve reported this recently but it’s still there the smell is terrible as there is so much can this be cleared please everyone stops here with there dog so I hope there also could be a long term solution to this thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Oakfield Road, Anerley, London

item.title: Pothole/Depression of highway surface, 23rd August
item.description:
Huge depression forming by the round about following some excavation works. The reinstatement works did not compact the ground properly. It been like this for + 6 months and getting worse. Feels terrible as bus goes over it
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Asylum Road, Peckham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bins, 23rd August
item.description:
Bins on the pavement for 7 months now. They have front gardens if they can't put them at the back, they bought the houses. The bins were always in the back, perhaps they have a deal with the council, I will be talking to the local counsellor soon.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bexley Lane, Crayford, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dangerous sharp metal sticking out of swing - my child cut his arm, 23rd August
item.description:
Circular swings, one is missing all of its black rubber cover over the part of the swing that children rest their arms on which keeps them secure. Bits of sharp metal poking out and my child (2 years) cut his arm today.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Springfield, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish not been emptied for a week, 23rd August
item.description:
This rubbish bin is continually full, it’s not emptied often enough and is probably the reason the street get strewn in litter, this time it’s not been emptied for a week. It needs to be emptied and all litter that has been dispersed on the street needs to be picked up, it’s a disgrace.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Beck River Park, Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped car no tax,mot,insurance, 23rd August
item.description:
Dumped car no tax,mot,insurance this car has been here for over 3 months, there is now people taking drugs in it at night one of my neighbors did ask the users in the car to stop making noise at 2am and was told to go away or would be stabbed now were scared please can you do your job and remove this car also this has already been reported two times

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Frances Street, Charlton Riverside, London
